tasks.title: Bootstrap Go CLI and render first JSONL file
tasks.description: Implement `sift -f <path>` to ingest a local JSONL file, infer core fields (timestamp/level/message), and render readable rows in the local web UI.

tasks.title: Event detail drawer and copy JSON
tasks.description: Add per-row drill-down with full structured payload and copy-to-clipboard for raw JSON.

tasks.title: Full-text search across log events
tasks.description: Add deterministic full-text search via query bar with keyboard-first interaction.

tasks.title: Live stream ingestion with pause/resume
tasks.description: Support streaming ingestion via CLI input (stdin/tail) with ordered append and pause/resume behavior.

tasks.title: Field filters and search-filter composition
tasks.description: Implement field operators (equals, not-equals, contains, exists, range) and combine with search using deterministic AND semantics.

tasks.title: Parse error visibility and ingest status rail
tasks.description: Surface malformed JSON lines and ingest health metrics such as events/sec, parse errors, and dropped events.

tasks.title: Saved queries and persisted session state
tasks.description: Persist bookmarks and last session query/filter state for restore on startup.

tasks.title: Large-log performance and memory retention caps
tasks.description: Add virtualized rendering and bounded retention/eviction to keep UI responsive with 100k+ events.
